p: This Privacy Policy describes how „Skomantes keramika“ collects, uses, and protects the personal information of users visiting our website. This policy applies to the website {{url}}, and any related services or interactions.

p1.p: We may collect the following types of personal information from users: Contact Information: Name, address, email address, and phone number. Order Information: Details about products or services you purchase from us. Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address, and other payment-related information.

p2.p: We use the collected information for the following purposes: Order Processing: To fulfill and manage orders, including processing payments and shipping products. Communication: To communicate with you about your orders, provide customer support, and respond to inquiries. Marketing: With your consent, we may send you promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other updates.

p3.p: We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. Our website uses secure technologies to ensure the confidentiality of your data.

p4.p: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent. However, we may share information with trusted third parties involved in the operation of our website, such as payment processors and shipping companies.

p5.p: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, or if you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at {{email}}.

p6.p: Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience. You can adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies, but this may limit some functionalities.

p7.p: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.

p8.p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: „Skomantes keramika“ {{physicalLocation}} {{email}} {{phone}} Effective Date: {{date}}
